title: Biological pollution: 400kg of animal bones and ... - Reddit
body: The real-time pollution and waste map, a #GIS aimed at spotting and reporting any source of pollution, waste, or litter observed in the environment on a live world map. ... 🇰🇷 Plastic pollution: microplastic detected in seagull feathers on East Sea islands, South Korea self.Pollution_Waste_Map upvotes r/Pollution_Waste_Map ...
readable_content:
- LivePollutionMap (2023-12-07): OK, here France 3 TV's report regarding cattle/pork bones and carcasses being illegally scattered in woods around a village in SW of France. Fly-tipping animal remains into the environment is also a hazardous biological pollution.
